items.sentence: While the rest of us toil, the robber barons eat from gilt tableware.
I can't understand Tom and Mary when they speak French to each other.
I grew up in Boston, but I've lived most of my adult life in Chicago.
Tom told me that he'd go with you to pick Mary up at the bus station.
I think that perhaps Tom and Mary have both forgotten how to do that.
I tried doing it several times by myself before I asked Tom for help.
At that time, black children didn't go to school with white children.
Tom and I got to spend a little time together while he was in Boston.
Tom's confident that he'll be able to find a solution to the problem.
Tom has been convicted of drunk driving twice in the last four years.
